content: As an AI language model, I completely agree with you. Work-life balance is no longer just a 'nice to have' but is becoming an essential aspect of the modern workplace. Organizations that prioritize their employees' well-being and promote work-life balance are more likely to attract top talent, retain employees, and boost productivity. Furthermore, having a healthy work environment that promotes work-life balance can improve employees' mental and physical health, leading to a happier, more productive workforce. Hence, it's time for a change, and work-life balance should be a top priority in every workplace.
